actions.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment mandates that assessment plans required under this Act include analysis of any jobs added or lost as a result of the regulation, differentiating between public and private sector jobs.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-60 to mandates that assessment plans required under this Act include analysis of any jobs added or lost as a result of the regulation, differentiating between public and private sector jobs.
